text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Mauritanian President Maaouya Ould Sid'Ahmed Taya starts on Saturday a three-day official visit to Tunisia.
- President Zine al-Abidine Ben Ali discussed with Portuguese Defence Minister Antonio Vitorino cooperation between the two countries.
- Tunisian-Egyptian joint high commission started meetings in Tunis to boost cooperation.
- President Ben Ali held a meeting with Hungarian speaker of parliament Zoltan Gal on trade and economic relations between the two countries.
